name: The Pro Mahjong: Menkyo Kaiden
overview: The Pro Mahjong - Menkyo Kaiden is a mahjong game that features 5 different boards, 2 game modes: - Tournament: Compete againts different opponents advancing rounds. - Free Mode: Play mahjong games againts 15 Japanese spies of the Japan Pro Mahjong Federation opponents. In the tournament domination mode, you can challenge the ranking certification exam at each rank.
